definition: term of respect for your teacher's wife

sentences.english: With trees and flowers everywhere, living conditions can be improved.
sentences.chinese: 到处师母环绕鲜花芬芳，生活条件就得到极大的改善。

sentences.english: Please pray for the trip of Pastor Sam & Jeannie.
Sister Tan Ay Eeng was the song leader of that night.
sentences.chinese: 当晚的领唱是陈爱萤师母。

sentences.english: Damema assisted him to join a teaching session but still he got kicked out by Marpa.
sentences.chinese: 师母帮他混进别人求法的教学里，还是被赶了出去。

sentences.english: Pastor Pai and wife will be attending.
sentences.chinese: 牧师与师母将前往参加。

sentences.english: Mrs. Ko is still recovering in California.
sentences.chinese: 高师母仍在加州休养复原。

sentences.english: On the way out they bump into the pastor's wife.
sentences.chinese: 他们出来的时候碰上师母。

sentences.english: Rev. Yew and wife Maryann have two sons and four grandchildren.
sentences.chinese: 游牧师与师母陈慈爱女士共有两位儿子以及四名孙儿。

definition: used for 師傅|师傅 (in Taiwan)/master/qualified worker
wife of father's elder brother/aunt/(polite form of address for a woman who is about the age of one's mother)/CL:個|个[ge4]
junior female student or apprentice/daughter (younger than oneself) of one's teacher
senior male fellow student or apprentice/son (older than oneself) of one's teacher
senior female fellow student or apprentice/daughter (older than oneself) of one's teacher
father's elder brother/term of respect for older man/CL:個|个[ge4]
older brother's wife/sister-in-law/(polite address to a younger married woman) sister
young disciple (of the same master)/younger or junior male schoolmate
